name: asana-api-explorer
description: A node.js client for the Asana API Explorer

scripts.compile: find src test typings -name "*.ts" | xargs tsc --module commonjs --target es5 --noImplicitAny --outDir build
scripts.lint: find src test -name "*.ts" | sed 's/^/--file=/g' | xargs tslint
scripts.setup: rm -rf node_modules typings && npm install && npm run typings
scripts.browserify: browserify build/src/index.js -t [ envify purge ] --standalone AsanaTester --outfile dist/asana-tester.js
scripts.pretest: npm run compile -- --sourceMap && find build -type f -name *.js -exec sed -i .bak -e '1s/^var __extends/\/\* istanbul ignore next \*\/var __extends/; 1s/^/require("source-map-support").install();/' {} \;
scripts.update: git fetch && git merge origin master && npm run setup
scripts.web: npm run compile && npm run browserify
scripts.release: npm run web && uglifyjs dist/asana-tester.js -o dist/asana-tester-min.js

author: Asana
